name: 吳斯偉
objective:
使學生瞭解國際金融之理論與國際金融市場之概況：1. 國際金融市場形成之基礎和背景 2. 介紹中央銀行及國際公營金融中介機構 3. 外匯市場、國際債券市場、國際股票市場、衍生性金融商品市場 4. 國際利率套利與利率均衡論 5. 國際金融市場與金融創新
To understand theory of international finance and the international financial markets. 1.Introduction to the international financial markets 2.Central banks and international public financial intermediaries, such as BIS and World Bank. 3.Foreign Exchange Market, Int'l Bond Market, Int'l Stock Market, Derivative Market, etc. 4.Interest Rate Parity Theory. 5.Financial Revolution
schedule:
1. the introduction of international financial markets and institutions
2. overview of the financial system
3. fundamentals of international financial markets
4-5. the interest rates
6. the EMH
7-8. Financial crises overview
9-10. Monetary policy
11. Bond Market
12-13. Stock Market
14-15. Mortgage Market
16-17. Foreign Exchange Market
18. Financial Regulation
scorePolicy:
class exam and group work every week 100%
(每周的第三節課都有隨堂考試和隨堂小組作業)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
